patterns.description: The glob patterns for the php files you want to lint. Uses the fast-glob syntax: https://www.npmjs.com/package/fast-glob.

ignore.description: The glob patterns to exclude matches.

cwd.description: Base directory for finding the php files and running the php linter. Defaults to the workspace root.

dot.description: Include directories and files that start with a '.'

bail.description: Stop immediately if one file is invalid.
